name: Downfall Dungeon
description:
Downfall Dungeon is an addictive arcade game where the main focus is to jump and parry off of enemies to avoid falling into the abyss below. You are always falling, but if you fall off the screen, you lose! You can also get points based on how many enemies you defeat. Once you rack up enough points, you can buy cosmetics for your slime character! 

This game was made in three days for the Score Space #9 gamejam. The creators are Cheesecat (Caden) and Saltbag (Ethan)
